flawed_nl_solution:
The total number of insects collected is 200 insects + 300 insects = <<200+300=5000>>5000 insects.
When the teacher divided the class into 4 groups, each group got 5000 insects / 4 groups = <<5000/4=1250>>1250 insects/group
#### 1250

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
